version_description:
- Squad Alpha is now released WORLDWIDE!
- Sign in to save your progress and multiple device support.
- Coming soon: new campaign and hunt levels, limited time skirmishes, social content.

- New mission type: SKIRMISH! Test your skills with new objectives and various enemy modifiers. New skirmish every 2 hours. Note: available from account level 8.
- New episodes! New campaign levels along with the new world, enemies and bosses!
- Hunt improvement: extended difficulty range and new booster to open the chests instantly!
- Discord server! Join, share and discuss with other agents worldwide!
- Coming soon: more social content and worldwide challenges!
